name: CRUCIFORM
description:
A first person sword fighting game, with physically simulated blocking and slicable enemies, inspired by my real life fencing and HEMA practice.

Take your longsword and slay the Golden Tyrants

Created for a university assignment in 2019, for which I received an A grade.

Unfortunately, I've since lost the project files and though I would like to "finish" the project, it looks unlikely, perhaps I will revisit the idea in the future!

CONTROLS:

Movement: WASD and Mouse look

Swing Left: Left Click

Swing Right: Right Click

Overhead Swing: Middle Mouse

Block Mode: Hold shift, click different swing buttons to block those swings.

R: Reset

Escape: Quit
